Description: The length of the statement  "	IEnumerable<Type> nativeValidatorsToRegister = assembly.GetTypes ().Where (x => x.IsClass && !x.IsAbstract && x.Namespace == "NHibernate.Validator.Constraints" && x.Name.EndsWith ("Validator")); " is 194.
The following statement contains a magic number: if (name.Length < 2)  	context.AddInvalid ("The name should have at least 2 letters.");
